languages.text: "Он еще не узнал нас. Но узнает, если ты позволишь, {name}. Мы знаем... чувствуем, что его слова обращены к нам, расказанная история — наша история".
"He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."
languages.original_text: "Он еще не узнал нас. Но узнает, если ты позволишь, {name}. Мы знаем... чувствуем, что его слова обращены к нам, расказанная история — наша история".

traits.locale_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

traits.locale_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: 「彼はまだ我々のことを知らない。あなたが彼に教えれば彼も知るだろう、{name}。我々は分かっている…彼の言葉は我々についてのこと。彼が話したことは我々の物語なのだ」
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はまだ我々のことを知らない。あなたが彼に教えれば彼も知るだろう、{name}。我々は分かっている…彼の言葉は我々についてのこと。彼が話したことは我々の物語なのだ」
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: “他还不认识我们，但如果你允许的话，我们可以彼此认识，{name}。我们知道……我们能感觉到，他要说正是关于我们的事情。他要讲述的故事，就是关于我们的故事。”
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: “他还不认识我们，但如果你允许的话，我们可以彼此认识，{name}。我们知道……我们能感觉到，他要说正是关于我们的事情。他要讲述的故事，就是关于我们的故事。”
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: "Er hat uns noch nicht kennengelernt. Das wird er, wenn Ihr ihn einlasst, {name}. Wir wissen ... wir spüren, dass es in seinen Worten um uns geht, dass die Geschichte, die er erzählt hat, unsere Geschichte ist."
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat uns noch nicht kennengelernt. Das wird er, wenn Ihr ihn einlasst, {name}. Wir wissen ... wir spüren, dass es in seinen Worten um uns geht, dass die Geschichte, die er erzählt hat, unsere Geschichte ist."
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: « Il ne nous connaît pas encore, mais cela viendra si vous le laissez faire, {name}. Nous savons... Nous sentons que ses paroles nous concernent, que l'histoire qu'il a racontée est la nôtre. »
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne nous connaît pas encore, mais cela viendra si vous le laissez faire, {name}. Nous savons... Nous sentons que ses paroles nous concernent, que l'histoire qu'il a racontée est la nôtre. »
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: «Aún no ha tenido ocasión de conocernos. Lo hará si usted se lo permite, {name}. Sabemos... notamos que sus palabras se refieren a nosotros, que la historia que ha narrado es la nuestra».
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: «Aún no ha tenido ocasión de conocernos. Lo hará si usted se lo permite, {name}. Sabemos... notamos que sus palabras se refieren a nosotros, que la historia que ha narrado es la nuestra».
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: "Henüz bizden haberi yok. İzin verirseniz bizi tanıyacak {name}. Biliyoruz... Sözleri bizden söz ediyor, anlattığı hikâye de bizim hikâyemiz."
languages.original_text: "He has not come to know us yet. He will if you let him, {name}. We know... we sense that his words are about us, that the story he has told is our story."

traits.locale_text: "Bizden henüz haberi yok. İzin verirseniz bizi tanıyacak {name}. Biliyoruz... Sözleri bizim hakkımızda, anlattığı hikâye de bizim hikâyemiz."
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1
